data.actual_result: Playback sometimes continues until hovered over again
data.expected_result: Provided that the cursor is off of the GIF, playback should stop
data.short_description: Quickly swiping over a GIF continues playback when not hovered over
data.steps_to_repro: - Find a GIF, not a GIFV (If it pauses instead of restarting, when stopping playback, find one that restarts) - Hover quickly over the GIF (I find it's easy when swiping arbitrarily over the corner, shouldn't take more than 25 swipes or so, might take a bit of finesse)
